sect1.title: Who Would Want To Read This Book
sect1.para: This is the user's guide for &book-product; v&nalfs-version;. If you have &book-product; installed on your computer and want to know how to use it, then you have found the right place. &book-product; is a tool to automate the build procedure for the LFS book. It can also be used to automate software package installation steps or any other administrative task you can think of. The ALFS DTD has many features available for use inside the tool.
